Module it.polimi.ingsw.am52
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am52.model.playingBoards

Interface BoardInfo

All Superinterfaces:
ItemsProvider, ResourcesProvider
All Known Implementing Classes:
PlayingBoard, PlayingBoard.PlayingBoardInfo
public interface BoardInfo extends ResourcesProvider, ItemsProvider
Information related to the playing board of a player.

  • Method Details

    • getCoveredSlots

      ImmutableList<BoardSlot> getCoveredSlots()
      Returns:
      The list slots where a Kingdom card is placed.

    • getAvailableSlots

      ImmutableList<BoardSlot> getAvailableSlots()
      Returns:
      The list of available slot on the playing board, where a new Kingdom card can be placed.

    • getNeighborCard

      Optional<KingdomCardFace> getNeighborCard(BoardSlot refSlot, RelativeLocation location)
      Check if there is a card placed on the neighbor slot and return that card. If there isn't a card, return an Optional.empty().
      Parameters:
      refSlot - The reference slot.
      location - The relative location of the neighbor slot.
      Returns:
      The (optional) card placed on the specified relative location.

    • getNeighborCard

      Optional<KingdomCardFace> getNeighborCard(BoardSlot refSlot, CornerLocation location)
      Check if there is a card placed on the neighbor slot and return that card. If there isn't a card, return an Optional.empty().
      Parameters:
      refSlot - The reference slot.
      location - The Corner location of the neighbor slot.
      Returns:
      The (optional) card placed on the specified relative location.

    • getCardAt

      KingdomCardFace getCardAt(BoardSlot slot) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Returns the KingdomCard in the slot, otherwise throws exception if card is not found
      Parameters:
      slot - the BoardSlot to test
      Returns:
      The card placed on the slot
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException
